components.Contacts.AddChannel.manual_de: Hm, looks like we can't see that node from here, wanna try to manually connect?
components.Contacts.SubmitChannelForm.de: Opening a channel will help you send and receive money on the Lightning Network. You aren't spending any money, rather moving the money you plan to use onto the network.
components.Contacts.SubmitChannelForm.du: You currently have {activeChannels, plural, zero {no active channels} one {1 active channel} other {{activeChannels} active channels}} open to {aliasMsg, select, this_node {this node} other {{aliasMsg}}} with a capacity of
components.Contacts.SuggestedNodes.empty: Hmmm, looks like you don't have any channels yet. Here are some suggested nodes to open a channel with to get started
components.Form.Pay.request_placeholder: Paste payment request or bitcoin address here
components.Form.Pay.title: Make Payment
components.Form.Request.title: Request Payment
components.Onboarding.BtcPayServer.btcpa: Paste the full content of your BTCPay Server connection config file. This can be found by clicking the link entitled 'Click here to open the configuration file' in your BTCPay Server gRPC settings.
Are you sure you want to connect to
Path to the lnd tls cert. Example: /path/to/tls.cert
Hostname and port of the Lnd gRPC interface. Example: localhost:10009
Path to the lnd macaroon file. Example: /path/to/admin.macaroon
components.Onboarding.ConnectionType.btc: Connect to your own BTCPay Server instance to access your BTCPay Server wallet.
components.Onboarding.ConnectionType.cus: Connect to your own node. You will need to provide your own connection settings so this is for advanced users only.
components.Onboarding.ConnectionType.def: By selecting the defualt mode we will do everything for you. Just click and go!
Password must be at least {passwordMinLength} characters long
components.Onboarding.Syncing.fund_descr: Might as well fund your wallet while you’re waiting to sync.
components.Onboarding.Syncing.grab_coffe: It looks like this could take some time - you might want to grab a coffee or try again later!
components.Onboarding.Syncing.sync_descr: Please wait a while whilst we fetch all of your latest data from the blockchain.
components.Onboarding.Syncing.sync_title: Welcome back to your Zap wallet!
components.Onboarding.alias_description: Set your nickname to help others connect with you on the Lightning Network
components.Onboarding.autopilot_descript: Autopilot is an automatic network manager. Instead of manually adding people to build your network to make payments, enable autopilot to automatically connect you to the Lightning Network using 60% of your balance.
components.Onboarding.btcpay_description: Enter the connection details for your BTCPay Server node.
components.Onboarding.confirm_connection: Confirm the connection details for your Lightning node.
components.Onboarding.connection_descrip: By default Zap will spin up a node for you and handle all the nerdy stuff in the background. However you can also setup a custom node connection and use Zap to control a remote node if you desire (for advanced users).
components.Onboarding.connection_details: Enter the connection details for your Lightning node.
components.Onboarding.connection_title: How do you want to connect to the Lightning Network?
components.Onboarding.create_wallet_pass: Looks like you are new here. Set a password to encrypt your wallet. This password will be needed to unlock Zap in the future
components.Onboarding.import_description: Recovering a wallet, nice. You don't need anyone else, you got yourself :)
components.Onboarding.login_description: It looks like you already have a wallet (wallet found at: `{walletDir}`). Please enter your wallet password to unlock it.
components.Onboarding.retype_seed_descri: Your seed is important! If you lose your seed you'll have no way to recover your wallet. To make sure that you have properly saved your seed, please retype words {word1} {word2} and {word3}
components.Onboarding.save_seed_descript: Please save these 24 words securely! This will allow you to recover your wallet in the future
components.Onboarding.signup_description: Would you like to create a new wallet or import an existing one?

components.Settings.Locale.title: Language
